text.0: Ðē hē ūsic on herge gecēas, 'on this account he chose us (from) among the host.' This function of on is parallel to that found in combination with niman, see Gloss.: on; cp. Vita Guthlaci 1.7: him pā āne gecēas on pǣre mǣdena hēape. Ðē is used correlatively with be 2641; see Gloss.: sē, pē.
